item.description:
Ted Tieken will give an overview of the registration, authentication, and social integration landscape for Django apps, then give a demonstration of setting up a Facebook-enabled signup and login process with the django-allauth package.

Questions this talk will answer:

  • How do I let users signup/in with Facebook/Twitter/Google?
  • What are the most popular apps and packages for registration/auth/social-auth?  Which one(s) should I use?
  • What's the difference between Authentication and Authorization?
  • Which parts does Django handle natively vs delegate to your implementation?
  • Why should I care about registration and login?


At the talk Ted will be using and releasing the results of his Registration and Authentication survey, https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/BYBXG59.  Please fill it out if you haven't already.

item.name: Signing Up and Signing In: User Registration, Auth, and Social Registration/Auth
